Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Activity of Snake B-Defensins and Derived Peptides
Literature.Author: Oguiura N, Corrêa PG, Rosmino IL, de Souza AO, Pasqualoto KFM

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>105µM),Micrococcus luteus A270(MIC=3.2µM),Citrobacter freundii(MIC=>105µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>105µM),Morganella morganii(no activity data),Providencia rettgeri(no activity data),Serratia marcescens(no activity data),Klebsiella pneumoniae(no activity data)
